Trade/Device Name(s): Thermo Scientific CEDIA Cocaine OFT Assay
Submitter Information: Thermo Fisher Scientific, Clinical Diagnostic Division
Regulation Name(s): Cocaine and cocaine metabolite test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Thermo Scientific CEDIA Cocaine OFT Assay for qualitative determination of cocaine in oral fluid using enzyme immunoassay on the MGC240.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative determination of cocaine in human oral fluid at a 15 ng/mL cutoff, with specimens collected via Oral-Eze Saliva Collection System and testing performed on the MGC240, for clinical laboratory use only.
